item.title: [Rs2][SRL]Arr0w's AutoTalker Even Maked Mistakes![SRL][RS2]
item.dc:creator: @arr0w Arr0w
item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

hello thanks for looking at my autotalker.

-Types humanlike.
-Makes mistakes if you choice it to
-Fully working progress report
[scar]program AutoTalker;
{.Include SRL/SRl.Scar}
{-------------------------Arr0w’s AutoTalker------------------------------]
[ # ScriptName =AutoTalker! ]
[ # Author = Arr0w ]
[ # Description = AutoTalks and even makes mistakes ]
[ # Authors Email = Scott--bradford@hotmail.com ]
[ # Date = Released on the 24 october 2006 ]
[ # Comments = Please post all Bugs/Corrections in this script’s thread. ]
[-------------------------------------------------------------------------]
[ ]
[ /\ |===\ |===\ /===\ | | /==\ ]
[ / \ | | | | | | | | / ]
[ | | |__/ |___/ | | | | ===\ ]
[ |====| | \ | \ | | \ /\ / / ]
[ | | | \ | \ ===/ / / ==/ ]
[ ]
[ /\ | | ===== /===\ ===== /\ | | / |=== |===\ ]
[ / \ | | | | | | / \ | | / | | | ]
[ | | | | | | | | | | | |< |== |___/ ]
[ |====| | | | | | | |====| | | \ | | \ ]
[ | | ===/ | ===/ | | | |=== | \ |=== | \ ]
[ ]
{-------------------------------------------------------------------------}
//=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-Setup-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-\
const
WhatToSay = ‘Hello People’; //What do you want to say?\
MakeMistakes = True; //Do you want the script to make mistakes every now and then to make it seem real?\
TimesToSay = 50; //Times to say?\
//=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-End Of Setup-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=\
Var
TimesSaid: Integer;

Procedure SenddText;
Begin
If MakeMistakes = True then
Begin
SendText2(WhatToSay);
Wait(100 + Random(100));
TimesSaid := TimesSaid + 1;
End;
End;

Procedure AutoTalkerr;
Begin
If MakeMistakes = False then
Begin
SendText(WhatToSay);
Wait(100 + random(100));
TimesSaid := TimesSaid + 1;
End;
End;

Procedure ProgressReport;
Begin
WriteLn(’==============Progress Report=======================’)
WriteLn(’||Sentences typed : ’ + inttostr(TimesSaid) + ’ ||’);
WriteLn(’||This Autotalker was created by Arr0w ||’)
WriteLn(’||From moparisthebest and villu-reborn ||’)
WriteLn(’||To check for updates check moapristhebest ||’)
WriteLn(’||<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>||’)
End;

Begin
Repeat
ActivateClient;
ProgressReport;
SenddText;
AutoTalkerr;
Until (TimesSaid = TimesToSay)
End.[/scar]

Read full topic
